instructions: This is CosmoWAP, a Python library for cosmological power spectrum and bispectrum forecasting.
The /bk, /pk, and /bk_mt directories under src/cosmo_wap contain auto-generated or low-level computation modules - avoid modifying these unless specifically asked.
Focus on: forecast/, lib/, survey_params.py, and tests/.
Avoid changing comments and docstrings to just formalise and neaten the language - the tone is important!
CLASS (classy) initialization is expensive - tests use session-scoped fixtures to avoid repeated init.
Run tests with: python -m pytest tests/
